Tyl at þᵉ myller sporned at a ston4280
And doun he fell bakward on his wyf
Þat wiste no þing of þis nyce stryf
For she was fale aslepe alytel wyht
Wᵗith Iohn Iohn Iohn þᵉ clerk þᵗat waked her al nyht
And wᵗith þᵉ fall out of here slep she abrayde4285

Awake symond þᵉ fend is on me falle4288
In manus tuas lord to þe I calle4287
Myn hert is broken help I nam but ded

And by þᵉ walle a staf she tok anon̄
And say alyttell shynynge of a lyth
For in at an hole shon þᵉ mone bryth

And wend haue hyt Aleyn on þᵉ polle
